## write() function

Replaces any existing tags with the given tags in the given buffer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function write(tags: WriteTags, buffer: Buffer): Buffer;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tags | [WriteTags](./node-id3.writetags.md) |  |
|  buffer | Buffer |  |

**Returns:**

Buffer
